content:
Hi - new to using the testing suite and getting this error.( even tried to remove the resource from the step above from the "rerun tests button"
I am not sure where the error could be coming from :
Any help would be appreciated. inferno_provenance_error.png

Provenance is required by USCDI so the server shall allow client to access that resource. This test compares the scope it received from authorization with USCDI requirement. It looks like the your server does not allow patient/Provenance scope.
